title: API for Integrating Cognitive Stimulation Activities
summary: As a developer, I want an API that allows me to integrate cognitive stimulation activities into the ALFRED system so that I can create engaging applications that promote mental health for elderly users.

title: Integration of Physical Activity Tracking
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to integrate physical activity tracking from health-monitoring devices into the ALFRED system so that elderly users can receive personalized feedback on their activity levels and caregivers can monitor their health more effectively.

title: Open API Integration
summary: As a developer, I want access to robust APIs that allow me to integrate third-party health monitoring devices seamlessly so that I can create applications that enhance the functionality of ALFRED and improve the quality of life for elderly users.

title: Activity Effectiveness Feedback Integration for Healthcare Applications
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate activity effectiveness feedback into my applications so that users and caregivers can assess the impact of activities on the user's health and well-being.

title: Integration with Wearable Health Devices
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to easily integrate ALFRED with wearable health devices so that I can build applications that provide real-time health monitoring for elderly users and timely alerts for caregivers.

title: Guidelines for Developing Cognitive and Physical Activity Applications
summary: As a developer, I want clear guidelines for creating cognitive and physical activity applications so that I can ensure they are accessible, engaging, and beneficial for elderly users while maintaining compliance with healthcare regulations.

title: Enhancing Social Engagement through Motivational Challenges
summary: As a developer, I want to create motivational challenges within ALFRED that encourage social interaction among elderly users so that they can stay engaged and connected with their peers and caregivers.
